It sounds like you're aware of the need to make some changes to your morning routine.

Firstly, it's great that you're recognizing the impact of social media and email notifications on your mental state. Consider implementing a "no phone zone" in the morning, where you avoid checking your phone for at least 30 minutes after waking up. This can help you start your day more mindfully and reduce the likelihood of getting sucked into the vortex of social media.

Regarding your meditation practice, it's understandable that your mind is preoccupied with thoughts about your project. One approach could be to try a shorter, more focused meditation session, say 5-7 minutes, to help calm your mind and set intentions for the day. You could also try incorporating some gentle stretches or deep breathing exercises to help you relax and transition into your meditation practice.
